messages.message: could this be related to not doing gevent monkey patch? not familiar with what is different on sandbox cc: @Ashish
it seems to occur even when we do monkey patch (USE_GEVENT = true), I believe @Mohit is able to reproduce it locally as well

yes, i reproduced it locally, to simplify the problem (avoiding possible interference by reverse proxy, @verify_credentials â€¦) i also created the gist (above :point_up_2:). For the gist, i see this output (both `py2 AND py37`) :
```"GET / HTTP/1.1" 200 117 5.005606
1
2
::1 - - [2020-01-03 11:38:03] "GET / HTTP/1.1" 200 117 5.001209
1
2```
which shows that concurrent calls to the same API are sequential for some reason, even after monkey patching.

gist is inspired from this issue: https://github.com/gevent/gevent/issues/630
